content.rendered:
This is the PGP public key for Amir Montazery. It is 4096-bit and was generated in GPGTools for Apple OSX. This key was generated on 2017-03-09.

To import this key, you can either copy the text below (make sure you include the BEGIN and END lines) and paste it into a field in your application for importing, or you can paste this into a plain text file. After saving the key to a file you can import it into most of the popular PGP applications.

You can use this key to send encrypted mail to Amir. You can find the email address to reach Amir at the bottom of this page. (anti-OCR email image not yet completed)
